actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to permit the People's Republic of China to participate in programs of the United States which extend credits, credit guarantees, or investment guarantees.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to exempt China from the prohibition against participation by nonmarket economy countries in U.S. programs extending credit, credit guarantees, or investment guarantees.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Act of 1974 to permit the People's Republic of China to participate in programs of the United States which extend credits, credit guarantees, or investment guarantees.
